column5: Flyer is out.. lots of stuff. Like anything need to know your prices but looks like some good deals to be had.  Stuff we've been talking about around here lately...  Shimano Gortex Rainsuit $349.99 save $150  Aquaview Scout XL $249.99 save $150  Lindy Drift Socks in three sizes 1/2 price starting at $24.99  Frabill Scoop net #5400 21" x 25"  $24.99 = 1/2 price  Bushline Fishing Vest #6328 with 21 pockets $20 ! $80 OFF  Minnkota Endura 30 trolling motor 30" shaft/30lb thrust $69.99 1/2 price (factory renewed/full warranty)  Minnkota 55PDV2 power drive with built in maximizer 54" shaft $499.99 save $100  Eastman under cover turkey blind x5 camo $149.99 1/2 price  Helly Hansen survival (floater) suits $199.99 save $100  Uniden Solara DSC VHF Radio 25 watt black or white $99.99 Save $50  etc, etc,

NICE I just happen to have to pass by there on Sunday morning,bought my Curado/Compre there mid March could have got a better deal elsewhere but I had that darn itch that needed scratching,what ya buying

Can't believe I'm gonna say it... but I think I'm good for the season.. other than a bit of terminal tackle.. high quality snaps and swivels basically. Got everything else covered. Rods/reels/line/spoons/cranks... all covered thanks to Ebay thru the winter.

thanks for posting Irishfield  some good deals especially the survival suits and drift socks . tempted but see the 'pros' using buckets (blue seems to work the best) for trolling so guess thats good enough for us .  save the $ for gas this summer  TB
Bucket's easier to throw and retrieve as well Dave.. and has other uses once on board.. like bailing !
pull the proper cord and a drift sock is easier to retrieve.........
maybe but try bailing with a drift sock !  Also works as a head for the boat  TB
Yes i agree with common sense, just not the other statement about a bucket being easier to retieve than a drift sock.....lol.
was there today ,nothing to interesting lots of junk really ,no Power Pro so bought a few lures and buddy bought a new Shimano Crucial 20% off all rods reels non tagged
My son picked up a 40# MinnKota with maximizer for $269,  $200 off regular, a refurb, but full 3 year warrantee.
NEVER stopped you before Wayne!!!  Don
I picked up a few Live Target crank baits they seem nicely done cant wait to try em
